titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office located at 520 West Ponce De Leon Avenue in Decatur, Georgia, as the "Margie Pitts Hames Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 7/14/1998--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Post Office located at 520 West Ponce De Leon Avenue in Decatur, Georgia, as the Margie Pitts Hames Post Office.
